```{r}
pop <- read_excel("population.xlsx")
hateCrimes <- read_csv("Hate_Crimes_by_County_and_Bias_Type__Beginning_2010.csv")

dataset <- hateCrimes %>% 
  left_join(pop) %>% 
  mutate(ratio = `Total Incidents` * 10000 / Population) %>%
  arrange(desc(ratio)) 

hcrimes <- dataset %>% 
  write_rds("./FinalApp/dataset.rds")
```
